title: Trump Ghostwriter Meredith McIver Doesn’t Exist?
subtitle: When Donald Trump campaign ghostwriter Meredith McIver emerged to take the fall for Melania Trump's purported plagiarism, some onlookers questioned her existence.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Donald Trump's campaign invented a fictional speechwriter named Meredith McIver to take the heat after Melania Trump was criticized for purportedly plagiarizing Michelle Obama's 2008 convention speech.
